CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Meridian Teaching Hospital relative to Stellar Memorial Hospital?
SRP.A: Meridian Teaching Hospital is {below} Stellar Memorial Hospital in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silverhaven Community Hospital relative to Zenith Care Hospital?
SRP.A: Silverhaven Community Hospital is {below} Zenith Care Hospital in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silverhaven Community Hospital relative to Meridian Teaching Hospital?
SRP.A: Silverhaven Community Hospital is {below} Meridian Teaching Hospital in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total hospital bed occupancy?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Meridian Teaching Hospital}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total hospital bed occupancy?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Zenith Care Hospital}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Meridian Teaching Hospital's minimum Hospital Bed Occupancy in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Meridian Teaching Hospital's minimum Hospital Bed Occupancy is in {1951}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Silverhaven Community Hospital's minimum Hospital Bed Occupancy in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Silverhaven Community Hospital's minimum Hospital Bed Occupancy is in {1969}.

NC.Q: Between 1954 and 1958, was the average total Hospital Bed Occupancy higher or lower than between 1961 and 1962?
NC.A: The average total hospital bed occupancy between 1954 and 1958 was {lower} than between 1961 and 1962.

NC.Q: Between 1957 and 1963, was the average total Hospital Bed Occupancy higher or lower than between 1953 and 1962?
NC.A: The average total hospital bed occupancy between 1957 and 1963 was {higher} than between 1953 and 1962.

NC.Q: Between 1963 and 1964, did the total Hospital Bed Occupancy experience a larger or smaller change than between 1958 and 1959?
NC.A: The change in total hospital bed occupancy between 1963 and 1964 was {larger} than between 1958 and 1959.

NC.Q: Between 1957 and 1970, was the average total Hospital Bed Occupancy higher or lower than between 1955 and 1972?
NC.A: The average total hospital bed occupancy between 1957 and 1970 was {higher} than between 1955 and 1972.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Meridian Teaching Hospital} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Stellar Memorial Hospital and Meridian Teaching Hospital first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Stellar Memorial Hospital and Meridian Teaching Hospital first exchanged leading positions in {1952}.
